article_title: Obnoxious WH tweet brags about ‘cool’ Obama graduation pics; and scorn pours in!

og.description: President Selfie is at it again. After nearly two long presidential terms that have amounted to little more than a series of domestic disasters (Obamacare, immigration edicts and so on), foreign policy disasters (Benghazi, Russia, ISIS and so on), and never-ending photos ops, the White House sent a mass email showing how “cool” President Obama …
og.title: Obnoxious WH tweet brags about 'cool' Obama graduation pics; and scorn pours in!

article_summary:
— rae (@dl34l) May 21, 2015@WhiteHouse @POTUS Not cool at all.
http://t.co/Y7oXdn8wAq pic.twitter.com/V5OGblPZad — The White House (@WhiteHouse) May 21, 2015@WhiteHouse Are we going to see a Red Nose Day tweet from the White House, that would be soil cool.
http://t.co/K5YxkHO9qw pic.twitter.com/9nnHOgzsib — The White House (@WhiteHouse) May 20, 2015@WhiteHouse This President is a joke, so sad.
— Fred (@fredtorrez04) May 20, 2015@WhiteHouse Is Isis going to join you guys as you defend the planet.
— Kenneth W. Cromwell (@MadG0d) May 21, 2015@WhiteHouse Obie is disgusting.
